about.details:
Incorporated in 2017, Ganesh Infraworld Limited is a construction company offering a wide range of construction-related services. The company specializes in the construction of industrial, civil, residential, and commercial buildings, as well as road, railway, power, and water distribution projects across India.

Key Business Segments:

1. Civil and Electrical Infrastructure Projects

  • Includes residential and commercial buildings such as offices, hospitals, medical colleges, and towers.
  • Expertise in electrification of substations, power distribution lines, high-voltage transformers, and installation of heavy machinery in power stations.

2. Road and Rail Infrastructure Development Projects

  • Road projects include excavation, backfilling, and laying concrete and bituminous roads with necessary finishes like seal and tack coats.
  • Rail projects involve designing, erecting, testing, and commissioning overhead equipment (OHE) for railway operations.

3. Water Infrastructure Development Projects

  • Construction of water distribution systems, including laying pipelines, setting up pumping systems, water treatment plants, and reservoirs.
  • Notable projects include participation in the "Har Ghar Jal Mission" in Uttar Pradesh in 2022-23.

The company provides end-to-end EPC (Engineering, Procurement, and Construction) services, covering planning, design, execution, and material supply for civil, electrical, mechanical, and industrial projects.

Ganesh Infraworld has clients such as Magnum Ventures Limited, Raikela Iron Ore Mines, JD Cables Private Limited, Celica Motocorp Private Limited, Jain International Power Limited, and Nirmala Developers.

Ganesh Infraworld Limited operates in various states, including Rajasthan, Uttar Pradesh, Maharashtra, Odisha, Haryana, Jharkhand, Bihar, Jammu & Kashmir, Andhra Pradesh and Chhattisgarh.

As of August 31, 2024, the company had 41 active projects valued at about Rs 57,485.53 lakhs. These projects are spread across 13 different states and sectors.

As of August 31, 2024, the company has 42 department employees.

faqs.question: What is the Ganesh Infraworld IPO?
faqs.answer:
Ganesh Infraworld IPO is a SME IPO of 11876800 equity shares of the face value of ₹5 aggregating up to ₹98.58 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹83 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on November 29, 2024, and closes on December 3, 2024.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Ganesh Infraworld IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Ganesh Infraworld IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Ganesh Infraworld IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Ganesh Infraworld IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Ganesh Infraworld IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Ganesh Infraworld IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Ganesh Infraworld IPO opens on November 29, 2024 and closes on December 3, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Ganesh Infraworld IPO?
faqs.answer: Ganesh Infraworld IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,32,800.

faqs.question: How to apply for Ganesh Infraworld IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Ganesh Infraworld IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Ganesh Infraworld IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Ganesh Infraworld IPO will be done on Wednesday, December 4, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, December 5, 2024. Check the Ganesh Infraworld IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Ganesh Infraworld IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Ganesh Infraworld IPO listing date is on Friday, December 6, 2024.
